results.title: [Long fliv the king]
results.creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Leo McCarey
results.brief_description: Featuring Oliver Hardy in a bit role (before he teamed up with Stan Laurel) this silent film tells the story of a princess who upon learning the news that her father has died is given 24 hours to find a husband in order for her to become queen. Cast includes Charley Chase and Martha Sleeper. NB: Title. credits and last few feet of film missing.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Leo McCarey

results.title: [Little women : publicity kit]
results.brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Little Women (1994), including 8 B&W Stills (Large), 5 35mm Colour Transparencies, 1 Press Kit/ Review. Director Gillian Armstrong, Starring Winona Ryder, Trini Alvarado, Kirsten Dunst, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis, Susan Sarandon, Christian Bale, Gabriel Byrne.
